releaseNotes:
Track the price of your favourite cryptocurrency with our new Widget!

NB: must have iOS 17+

We are constantly updating our app to make your experience even better. Remember to turn on automatic updates to make sure that you do not miss out!  

We hope you will be happy with the update! As always, we are here to help. If you come across a bug, want to provide feedback or need any help, you can reach us at support@firi.com.
description:
Buy, sell and save in Bitcoin, Ethereum, and a variety of other cryptocurrencies with Firi. Firi is a Nordic cryptocurrency exchange with over 200,000 customers in Norway and Denmark. 

EASY TO BUY AND SELL CRYPTO
Firi is a Nordic cryptocurrency exchange - We offer a number of well-known cryptocurrencies such as Bitcoin, Ethereum, XRP, Cardano, Litecoin, Stablecoins, Polkadot, Solana, and more. We are constantly working to expand the list of available cryptocurrencies. You can trade crypto easy and safe in the Firi-app, or access advanced trading opportunities, on our web-based trading platform.

EASY SIGNUP
With Firi, starting with crypto is easy, safe and quick. You can use Vipps or MitID to register today. You can also register by email, if you wish. You can also easily trade crypto with Vipps. (Bank card or Apple Pay is also possible.)

EARN PASSIVE INCOME ON YOUR CRYPTO WITH STAKING
Firi offers staking of Ethereum (ETH) where you get weekly rewards for helping to secure and operate the blockchain. You can thus get an annual percentage return on your money by locking your ether for a certain period. With Firi, you can stake cryptocurrency incredibly easily. Read more about staking in the app or on our website.

FIXED SAVINGS AND INVESTMENT IN CRYPTOCURRENCY
With our “Kryptosparing” savings agreement, you can save regularly in one or more optional cryptos. This is an excellent investment strategy, because you reduce risk by spreading the purchases over a longer period. Firi gives you an exciting alternative to saving in funds and stocks.

EASY CRYPTO TAX WITH FREE TAX CALCULATOR
We know that many people are struggling with tax calculations on their cryptocurrency. To make this easier, you can use our cryptocurrency calculator to calculate your tax. Thus, we have made the tax calculations for you, and give you the four numbers that you should enter in your tax return. The tax calculator is free for all of our customers. 

YOUR CRYPTO IS INSURED AGAINST CYBERCRIME!
We follow strict safety routines, and we insure your funds. We partner with Ledger Enterprise Solutions and use Ledger Vault to secure our customers' cryptocurrencies, and your crypto is protected by high level security.

LOCAL SUPPORT
Firi's customer support is always here to help you. You can chat with us directly from the app when you are logged in, or you can send us an e-mail. 

Norway: support@firi.com
Denmark: support.dk@firi.com

EARN EXTRA CRYPTO WITH FIRI REWARD (FIRI FORDEL) 
With our loyalty program, “Firi Fordel”, you can earn extra crypto. For example, you earn 100 kroner in bitcoin for each friend you invite with your referral code. We can offer multiple rewards and contests where you can earn free cryptocurrency through our app.

DON'T WORRY ABOUT YOUR CRYPTO WALLET.
To make it safe and easy for you to get started, we will take care of all your crypto wallets for you. Your digital assets are being protected by the highest level of security on the market.

LOW FEES
The Firi app is free, and it is also free to deposit FIAT and crypto to Firi. When you buy and sell cryptocurrency, we charge a fee of only 0.7%, and we have low prices on withdrawals of cryptocurrency and FIAT. There are no hidden fees. See our complete price list: https://firi.com/about/transactions-and-fees

FOLLOW YOUR PORTFOLIOS CLOSELY
In the app, you can follow the development of your crypto portfolio.

TRANSFER TO EXTERNAL WALLETS
If you need to transfer your crypto to external wallets, or to other exchanges, this can also be done easily in the app. If you are interested in trying out DeFi, NFT and Metaverse, the Firi app is your gateway into the world of crypto.

ABOUT FIRI
Firi was started by Thuc Tuan Hoang and Øyvind Kvanes in 2017 because they missed a Nordic alternative in the crypto market. In 2019, Firi was registered with Finanstilsynet as a service provider for the exchange and storage of virtual currency in Norway. We are also registered with Finanstilsynet in Denmark.
